description:
Keep your velocity right where you want it with these powerful hydraulic brakes. Designed for the trail, the Level brakes use a reliable single piston system that keeps weight low, without compromising stopping power. And, stealthy reach adjustment lets riders of all sizes find that one-finger sweet spot.

  • Redesigned brake fluid reservoir helps seal out air bubbles, and release any air that does get trapped in the system
  • Hydraulic timing port for a precise braking feel and modulation
  • Hidden reach adjustment lets you find that perfect squeeze
  • Steel backed organic pads have plenty of bite, yet won’t howl at you in the rain
  • Light and strong aluminum construction
  • Hose length: front – 95cm, rear – 180cm
  • Uses DOT 5.1 brake fluid
name: SRAM Level Hydraulic Disc Brake
